name: BTDFDeploy
description: Deployment Framework for BizTalk btdfproj project target: Deploy
author: Jason Vercellone

inputs.name: Environment
inputs.label: Environment
inputs.helpMarkDown: The environment-specific 'Settings file name:' as shown in your SettingsFileGenerator.xml.  If the .xml extension is excluded, '_settings.xml' will be appended for backwards compatibility.  Leave blank to skip EnvironmentSettings export.

inputs.name: Destination
inputs.label: Destination
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path to the directory where the product is installed (optional; default is a subfolder by the same name as the product in `$env:ProgramFiles or `$env:ProgramFiles(x86)).

inputs.name: BTDeployMgmtDB
inputs.label: Deploy Mgmt DB
inputs.helpMarkDown: Boolean DeployBizTalkMgmtDB MSBuild property setting used when building the BTDF project (*.btdfproj).

inputs.name: SkipUndeploy
inputs.label: Skip Undeploy
inputs.helpMarkDown: Boolean SkipUndeploy MSBuild property setting used when building the BTDF project (*.btdfproj).  A dedicated Undeploy task is recommended over setting Skip Undeploy to false.  But, the option is here if desired.
